name: Dynamic form
author: Harshal Bajaj

sections.description:
This is Custom plugin to create customise forms

=Introduction=

Dynamic for is custom plugin to fullfill customer requirement. To create dynamic form for contact us or any other reason

=Installation=

  1. Upload the folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

=Configuration=

  1. Firstly, create a Page in WordPress, while creating add Title to page and enter the text as [hn_form] in the Visual section and then publish the page.
